title: Survival1 SoundEffect
longDescription:
Notice!

This pack is currently under discussion for a re-release within the team. We plan to re-release a better Survival Audio Pack. Please consider carefully before deciding to purchase this pack. This pack will be discontinued as soon as the new Survival Pack is released.


  • Reason for re-release: Poor quality compared to other products
  • Response to existing customers: If you send an email with your receipt attached, we will send you the Unreal Engine project files of the newly released product.



🎧️YoutubePreview


📖Overview.

The Survival1 Sound Pack is a comprehensive audio collection designed for various survival scenarios. It covers a wide range of sounds, including crafting, gathering, movement, and other essential survival actions. With a diverse set of sounds such as hitting, crafting, digging, and more, this pack is ideal for enhancing the audio experience in movies, animations, and various projects.




🕹️Functionality.


  • Diverse Survival Sounds: Craft, gather, move, and survive with a variety of essential sounds.
  • Comprehensive Categories: Includes hits, crafting, hammering, handsaw, smelting, digging, fishing, harvesting, pickaxe, planting, tree falling, footstep, bow, arrow, campfire, cooking, first aid, flint, gun, knife, lighter, matches, trap, and more.
  • Versatile Use: Suitable for movies, animations, and game projects.




📂AUDIO LIST

  • AudioList PDF




⭐5STAR Review.

  • If you like the product, please leave a 5-star review! We always have a great communication with our customers. :D
  • Even if you don't have the sound you want, please leave a 5-star review and feedback! We will check the customer's review every two weeks and fill in the sound as possible every two weeks! We will also give you a relevant reply if your opinion is reflected :D


♬CopyrightFreeMusic Playlist

We provide copyright-free music (CC0) content that can be used in various fields such as games, movies, animations, YouTube, etc., to ensure the success of your projects. Please check out our YouTube channel playlist through the link below! All the music tracks have been composed and produced by us directly. Therefore, we can guarantee that they are very safe from copyright issues.


  • Youtube Playlist
  • Reselling and using for AI training purposes are explicitly prohibited. It must be used as part of personal and corporate projects only.
technicalDetails:
TECHNICAL INFORMATION.

  • Number of Audio Wavs: 221
  • Number of Audio Cues: 221
  • Sample rate : 44.1kHz (Standard)
  • Bit Rate : 320Kbps (Standard)
  • Bit Depth : 24bit Depth (Standard)
  • Do Sound FX loop: No
  • Minutes of audio provided: 4:38
  • Supported Development Platforms: All
  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes


LOUDNESS.

  • Average Short Term : -10LUFS ~
  • Average Long Trem : -12LUFS ~
  • Average Range : 12LU ~
  • Average Momentary : -8LUFS ~
  • Average Trim : 3.0~
  • TruePeak : 0dBTP
  • The loudness values (Short Term, Long Term, Range, Momentary, TruePeak, etc.) may vary depending on the theme, timbre, and character of sound effects.


SOUND EFFECT CREATION METHODS.

How to Create: This product has been produced in a professional studio.

Mixing & Mastering : Yes, This product has been mastered in a professional studio.
